content.text: Peppoko is a member of the Alvida Pirates and the triplet brother of Heppoko and Poppoko.
Peppoko has long blonde hair, blonde eyebrows, and a blonde goatee. He wears a light blue headband, and a orange shirt with vertical lines on it and a black lining near the chest.

Typical of his thuggish appearance, Peppoko likes to intimidate Koby due to his low status and timid personality. He fears Alvida, and tried to deny slacking off (which she hates) when she found him doing so. He, like the rest of the crew, calls her beautiful simply to avoid her Iron Mace.
Peppoko wielded a sword against Luffy that was broken by him.

Peppoko, along with his crewmates Heppoko, Poppoko and Koby, found Luffy in the barrel he had drifted to their hideout in. The first three intimidated Koby due to his low status as a ship caretaker, and tried to attack Luffy, but were defeated. After that, they reported to Alvida when she attacked them, thinking they were slacking off.
The following events are Non-Canon and therefore not considered part of the Canon story.

Peppoko later reappears with a different color scheme at Loguetown alongside other members of Alvida's crew as a subordinate of Gally. Under orders from Gally, they attempt to raid the port area, but are foiled by Captain Smoker.
Although Peppoko appeared in the anime along with Heppoko and Poppoko, a miscellaneous crew member replaced Heppoko in the scene when Luffy's barrel was opened.
In the anime, Peppoko later reappears in the Loguetown Arc as a member of Gally's crew.
